/imgs/BioPE.webp.title: Bio-PE Certification (97% Biobased)
/imgs/BioPE.webp.description: I'm Green Bio-Polyethylene certification from BETA accredited laboratory showing 97% biobased content. PJLA #59423 accreditation with ISO/IEC 17025:2005 compliance. Test date March 2015. Braskem's sustainable bio-based plastic alternative.
/imgs/BioPE.webp.alt: I'm Green Bio-PE certification showing 97% biobased content - BETA ISO/IEC 17025:2005 accredited laboratory test results for bio-polyethylene sustainable packaging material

/imgs/cert-brcgs.webp.title: BRCGS Global Standard for Packaging Materials Certificate
/imgs/cert-brcgs.webp.description: BRCGS (British Retail Consortium Global Standards) certification for Packaging Materials. Issue 6 August 2019, Achieved Grade B+, Unannounced Audit Programme (1 in 3). Certified by SGS with UKAS accreditation. Covers gravure printing, digital printing, lamination, curing, slitting of flexible plastic film including BOPP, TOPP, POPP, PET, KPET, KOPP, VMCPP, VMPET, VMOPP, AL, BOPA, RCPP, CPP, PE-films for primary food contact packaging.
/imgs/cert-brcgs.webp.alt: BRCGS Global Standard for Packaging Materials Grade B+ certificate - Issue 6 August 2019 SGS certified with UKAS accreditation for food-safe flexible packaging production

/imgs/cert-bcorp-pending.webp.title: Certified B Corporation Pending Status
/imgs/cert-bcorp-pending.webp.description: B Corporation certification pending status badge. Shows company commitment to social and environmental performance, accountability, and transparency. B Corp certification measures a company's entire social and environmental impact. Black and white official B Corp pending logo design.
/imgs/cert-bcorp-pending.webp.alt: Certified B Corporation Pending logo - sustainable business certification in progress demonstrating commitment to social and environmental responsibility

/imgs/cert-din-home-compostable.webp.title: DIN CERTCO Home Compostable Certificate
/imgs/cert-din-home-compostable.webp.description: TÜVRheinland DIN CERTCO certification for home compostable packaging. Certificate for products made of compostable materials for home and garden composting. Compost Packing Bag tested to NF T51-800:2015 standard. Registration No. 9P0246, valid until December 31, 2029. Features DIN Geprüft Home Compostable seal and DAkkS accreditation.
/imgs/cert-din-home-compostable.webp.alt: DIN CERTCO TÜVRheinland home compostable certification for packaging bags - NF T51-800:2015 standard compliant valid until 2029 with DIN Geprüft seal

/imgs/carbon-capture-facility.webp.title: Direct Air Capture Carbon Removal Facility
/imgs/carbon-capture-facility.webp.description: Industrial Direct Air Capture (DAC) facility with large cylindrical fan collectors removing CO2 from the atmosphere. Climeworks-style carbon capture technology set against a green Swiss landscape with rolling hills and forests. Represents cutting-edge carbon removal technology for combating climate change and achieving carbon neutrality.
/imgs/carbon-capture-facility.webp.alt: Direct Air Capture DAC carbon removal facility with industrial CO2 collectors in green Swiss landscape - climate change technology for carbon neutral packaging

/imgs/infographic-data-comparison.webp.title: Achieve Pack Sustainability Data Infographic
/imgs/infographic-data-comparison.webp.description: The Data Doesn't Lie infographic comparing traditional packaging vs Achieve Pack sustainable solutions. Three key metrics: 70% Less Plastic usage, 70% Lower CO2 carbon footprint, and 70% Space Savings in storage efficiency. Visual comparison with bar charts showing reduction from 100% to 30%. Green and gray color scheme with Achieve Pack branding.
/imgs/infographic-data-comparison.webp.alt: Achieve Pack sustainability infographic showing 70% less plastic, 70% lower CO2, and 70% space savings compared to traditional packaging solutions

/imgs/landing-eco-pouch.webp.title: Eco Pouch Sustainable Packaging Product
/imgs/landing-eco-pouch.webp.description: Kraft brown stand-up pouch featuring eco pouch branding with green leaf icon. Tagline 'no plastic / no wastage / no problem' emphasizes sustainability. Product label states 'PLANT-BASED. COMPOSTABLE. ECO-FRIENDLY.' with Achieve Pack logo. Premium eco-friendly flexible packaging solution.
/imgs/landing-eco-pouch.webp.alt: Eco Pouch kraft brown compostable stand-up pouch - plant-based no plastic sustainable packaging with green leaf branding

/imgs/og-image.webp.title: Achieve Pack Hero Banner - Sustainable Packaging Solutions
/imgs/og-image.webp.description: Achieve Pack main hero visual showcasing 'Sustainable Packaging Solutions for a Greener Future'. Features multiple branded product pouches including Gold Dust, Carbon Imprint, Storm X, Tea Craft, Barky Bakey, Lorrie Hapilt, Sweet Spicy, Same Cooking Supplement displayed with decorative green leaves. Tagline: Biodegradable, Compostable, & Eco-Friendly Options for Every Product.
/imgs/og-image.webp.alt: Achieve Pack sustainable packaging hero banner featuring biodegradable compostable eco-friendly pouches for food brands with green leaves decoration

/imgs/infographic-our-process.webp.title: Achieve Pack Manufacturing Process Timeline
/imgs/infographic-our-process.webp.description: Our Process infographic showing 5-step packaging production workflow with 30-45 day total timeline. Steps include: 1) Consultation & Design (5-7 days) - free consultation, mockup design, material recommendation; 2) Proofing - PDF proof & cylinder approval; 3) Manufacturing (20-30 days) - mass printing with quality checks; 4) Quality Control (3-5 days) - final inspection & testing; 5) Delivery (2-3 days) - shipping with certification docs. Green progress bar with checkmarks.
/imgs/infographic-our-process.webp.alt: Achieve Pack 5-step packaging manufacturing process infographic - consultation design proofing manufacturing quality control delivery with 30-45 day timeline

/imgs/infographic-composting-timeline.we.title: Industrial Composting Timeline for Compostable Packaging
/imgs/infographic-composting-timeline.we.description: Composting Timeline infographic showing biodegradation process in industrial composting facility at optimal temperature and moisture. Features ASTM D6400 / EN13432 certification badge. Timeline stages: Week 1 - pouch placed in compost bin with initial microbial activity; Month 1 - early breakdown with edges fragmenting; Month 2 - continued decomposition; Month 3 - partial decomposition with accelerated microbial action; Month 4-5 - advanced decomposition into organic fragments; Final - complete decomposition into nutrient-rich soil. Shows Achieve Pack branded pouch degrading with earthworms and organic matter.
/imgs/infographic-composting-timeline.we.alt: Compostable packaging industrial composting timeline showing 5-month biodegradation process from intact pouch to nutrient-rich soil with ASTM D6400 EN13432 certification

/imgs/coffee-pouch-nature-scene.webp.title: Kraft Coffee Pouch in Natural Forest Setting
/imgs/coffee-pouch-nature-scene.webp.description: Premium kraft brown stand-up coffee pouch with Achieve Pack 'ap' leaf logo displayed in lush natural forest setting. Features clear window showing roasted coffee beans inside. Surrounded by ferns, succulents, moss, and rocks with warm sunlight filtering through green leaves. Perfect eco-friendly lifestyle product photography showcasing sustainable packaging in harmony with nature.
/imgs/coffee-pouch-nature-scene.webp.alt: Achieve Pack kraft brown coffee pouch with clear window showing coffee beans in natural forest setting with ferns succulents and sunlight

/imgs/surface-finishes-showcase.webp.title: Premium Pouch Surface Finishes Collection
/imgs/surface-finishes-showcase.webp.description: Showcase of 6 premium sustainable pouch surface finishes: 1) Matte Finish - dark green elegant matte texture; 2) Gloss Finish - silver metallic glossy surface; 3) Soft-Touch Finish - beige/tan velvety tactile surface with brush texture demo; 4) Metallic Finish - luxury gold metallic with 'ap' branding; 5) Embossed Pouch - navy blue with dimensional embossed pattern; 6) Spot UV Finish - black with selective UV glossy coating on logo. Premium sustainable finishes labeled.
/imgs/surface-finishes-showcase.webp.alt: Six premium pouch surface finishes - matte gloss soft-touch metallic embossed and spot UV packaging finish options for sustainable pouches

/imgs/solution-food-beverage.webp.title: Food & Beverage Packaging Solutions Lifestyle Scene
/imgs/solution-food-beverage.webp.description: Premium food and beverage packaging lifestyle photography on rustic wooden table. Scene includes cups of coffee and tea, dried orange slices, almonds, coffee beans, rosemary, cinnamon sticks, star anise, and succulent plant. Hands shown holding kraft pouch.

/imgs/solution-pet-products.webp.description: Pet food and treats packaging lifestyle scene featuring happy golden retriever in modern living room. /imgs/solution-wellness.webp.description: Health and wellness lifestyle scene showing woman pouring green superfood powder from white Achieve Pack stand-up pouch into glass of water with ice. /eco-logo/transparent-bkg/ap-logo.png.title: Achieve Pack Logo - Transparent Background
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/ap-logo.png.description: Official Achieve Pack 'ap' logo with integrated leaf design on transparent background. Green colored modern minimalist logo representing sustainable eco-friendly packaging brand. The leaf element symbolizes environmental commitment and natural materials.
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/ap-logo.png.alt: Achieve Pack green ap logo with leaf design on transparent background - sustainable packaging brand identity

/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/biope.png.title: I'm Green Bio-Polyethylene Logo
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/biope.png.description: Braskem 'I'm green' bio-polyethylene trademark logo on transparent background. Green text with integrated leaf design symbolizing plant-based sustainable plastic alternative. This certification mark indicates packaging made from sugarcane-based bio-PE, a renewable resource that reduces carbon footprint compared to fossil-based plastics.
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/biope.png.alt: I'm Green Braskem bio-polyethylene logo - plant-based sustainable plastic certification mark with green leaf design

/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/compost.png.title: Compostable Certification Seedling Logo
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/compost.png.description: Compostable certification trademark logo featuring green seedling/sprout design with registered trademark symbol. The iconic seedling represents biodegradable materials that break down into nutrient-rich compost. Used to indicate packaging certified to industrial or home composting standards like ASTM D6400, EN13432, or OK Compost.
/eco-logo/transparent-bkg/compost.png.alt: Compostable certification seedling logo - green sprout trademark symbol for biodegradable eco-friendly packaging materials
